request.description:
MCP Prompt 1: Persona Generator

Generates detailed insurance persona from email history

Expected Response:
{
  "status": "success",
  "persona": {
    "profile_name": "Conservative Investor",
    "insurance_types": ["Life", "Health"],
    "risk_profile": "conservative",
    "engagement_level": "high",
    "key_concerns": ["coverage", "affordability"],
    "estimated_annual_premium": 5000,
    "policy_count": "3"
  },
  "reasoning": "Generated from 20 insurance emails"
}
